Query.Sql: select distinct NHS_Number, Weight_At_Start_Of_Cycle, CASE -- Check for yyyy-MM-dd format (contains dash and year first) WHEN Start_Date_Of_Cycle LIKE '____-__-__' THEN CAST(strptime(Start_Date_Of_Cycle, '%Y-%m-%d') AS TIMESTAMP) -- dd/MM/yyyy format, where day is between 1 and 31 WHEN Start_Date_Of_Cycle LIKE '__/__/____' AND CAST(substring(Start_Date_Of_Cycle, 1, 2) AS INTEGER) BETWEEN 1 AND 31 THEN CAST(strptime(Start_Date_Of_Cycle, '%d/%m/%Y') AS TIMESTAMP) -- Otherwise assume MM/dd/yyyy format WHEN Start_Date_Of_Cycle LIKE '__/__/____' THEN CAST(strptime(Start_Date_Of_Cycle, '%m/%d/%Y') AS TIMESTAMP) ELSE NULL END AS Start_Date_Of_Cycle from omop_staging.sact_staging
